title: HERE'S WHY YOGA IS BEST FOR YOUR HEALTH
description: It’s time to roll out your yoga mat and discover the combination of physical and mental exercises that for thousands of years have hooked yoga practitioners around the globe. The beauty of yoga is that you don’t have to be a yogi or yogini to reap the benefits.

title: EATING APPLE IS THE SOURCE OF ENERGY
description: Here's what happens when you eat an apple: The carbohydrate breaks down into a sugar called glucose and enters your bloodstream (where it's termed “blood sugar”). That sugar travels to your cells, where it's turned into energy for your body.
